data.name: Stationeers: Human Cosmetics Pack
data.detailed_description:
This supports our project

Our DLC was made to provide a way for those who enjoy the project and want to further support it, and in return receive some simple new content. This content is not essential for the game. Consider purchasing this if you want to further provide financial support to the development.


About the Game

This pack enables new cosmetics for use by players with the Human Species in Stationeers.

Features

A stack of cosmetics that you can use when playing as a Human character.
  • Six new heads
  • Three new bodies
  • Eight new hair styles
  • A new beard
  • Three new moustaches
  • New "old" textures all existing and new human heads
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Enables cosmetics for the human species with new heads and hairstyles for playable characters.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Czech, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Danish, Finnish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB dedicated video RAM, Shader Model 4.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
